==Sindarin==
'''''penn''''', or '''''pend''''', is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "slope". The plural form of ''penn'' is '''''pinn''''' or '''''pind'''''. The collective plural form is '''''pennath''''' (cf. ''[[-ath]]''). A variant (dialectical or [[Númenórean Sindarin]]) plural form is ''[[pinnath]]''.<ref name=PE>{{PE|17}}, pp. 24, 173</ref><ref name=RC>{{HM|UI}}, p. 525</ref>

===Etymology===

*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[PED]]<ref name=PE/>

==Noldorin==

'''''penn''''', or '''''pend''''', is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "declivity".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 380</ref>

===Etymology===

The word derives from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[PED#Other versions|PEN, PÉNED]].<ref name=LR/>
